m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- ChinaAbout.net Ask A Question, Get An Answer Have a question about China? Need advice? Write an email to [email protected] and include "Ask ChinaAbout.net" in the subject line. All emails will be read and may be replied & published on our site.
